resume.name: SHRUTI PARK

responsibilities: Performed quarterly loss reserve analysis for personal auto lines, ensuring compliance with statutory accounting principles.
Developed automated reporting tools using R and SQL to track loss ratio trends and identify emerging risks in high-growth regions.
Collaborated with product management to prepare data for state rate filings and respond to regulatory inquiries.
Applied Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to refine pricing segments and improve competitive positioning.
Assisted senior consultants with the valuation of pension plan liabilities for corporate clients.
Utilized Excel and Python to clean large datasets and verify the accuracy of demographic data used in mortality projections.
Drafted technical documentation outlining methodology changes for annual valuation reports.
Performed sensitivity analysis on interest rate assumptions to evaluate impact on plan funding levels.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
